name: Verify 'Explore open roles' teams section including See all / See less behavior and links

statusDetails.message:
The following asserts failed:
	Team name mismatch at index 2 expected [Sales] but found [Customer Success],
	Description mismatch for: Sales expected [Never take no for an answer. Build relationships and help our customers get what they need in a fun and fast competitive culture.] but found [Partner with the marketers behind the growth of some of the world’s most beloved brands.],
	URL mismatch for: Sales expected [https://jobs.lever.co/insiderone?team=Sales] but found [https://jobs.lever.co/insiderone?team=Customer%20Success],

description:
### 👥 Explore open roles - Teams

Validations:
- Section title & subtitle from JSON.
- Collapsed state: 6 cards in main grid, remaining under see-more container.
- After expand, JSON team cards match UI cards.
- Open positions text follows pattern '<number> Open Positions'.
- Href sanity: non-empty, http/https, Insider or Lever domain.
- 'See all teams' expands list (aria-expanded + see-more container 'open' class).
- Optional: collapse back and verify aria-expanded & counts.

steps.name: Open Careers page
Wait for 'Explore open roles' section to be visible
Get 'Explore open roles' title
Get 'Explore open roles' subtitle
Get count of collapsed (top 3x2 grid) team cards
Get count of 'See more' team cards (inside see-more container)
Check 'See all teams' button is visible
Get current text of 'See all teams' toggle button
Get 'See all teams' aria-expanded attribute
Click 'See all teams' / 'See less' toggle button
Get 'See all teams' aria-expanded attribute
Check if see-more container has 'open' class
Get ALL team card details (top + see-more container)
Get team card view by index: 1
Get team card view by index: 2
Get team card view by index: 3
Get team card view by index: 4
Get team card view by index: 5
Get team card view by index: 6
Get team card view by index: 7
Get team card view by index: 8
Get team card view by index: 9
Get team card view by index: 10
Get team card view by index: 11
Get team card view by index: 12
Get team card view by index: 13
Get team card view by index: 14
Get team card view by index: 15
